info.author: Andreas Büsching
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
pyNotifier provides an implementation of a notifier/event scheduler and is
capable of wrapping other notifier implementations of GTK+, Qt and wxWindows.
This enables library developers to write code that may be used in applications
with
info.name: python-notifier
info.html_description: pyNotifier provides an implementation of a notifier/event scheduler and is capable of wrapping other notifier implementations of GTK+, Qt and wxWindows. This enables library developers to write code that may be used in applications with
